headline: GE Vernova Declares Second Quarter 2025 Dividend
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., April 08, 2025--GE Vernova (NYSE: GEV) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a $0.25 per share quarterly dividend. The quarterly dividend will be payable on May 16, 2025, to shareholders of record as of April 18, 2025.
